text: The Men's 1 km time trial competition at the 2018 UCI Track Cycling World Championships was held on 4 March 2018.ScheduleStart list ==Results== ===Qualifying=== The top 8 riders qualified for the final.Qualifying results {|class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- !
